item.description:
Talkin’ ‘Bout My Generation ...
Interacting in an Interactive Age

Jaclyn Stevenson
Writer, Publicist, Social Media Strategist

 

Most of us are familiar with the nicknames given to the different generations represented in the workplace — from the Sandwich Generation to Millennials (and beyond!). Technology has created such a rift among some of these people that even simple conversations can be difficult in the workplace. Understanding where each one of us is coming from, though, is half the battle.

 

The Social Butterfly: Focused on business, travel, culture, and health care as both a writer and a publicist, Jaclyn works to ensure that Winstanley Partners remains a trendsetter as new media continues to evolve. A prolific social networker, Jaclyn founded Thirty-something Bloggers, an international online community, and co-founded PodCamp Western Mass. She holds a bachelor's degree in English from Bridgewater State College and a master's in Organization Development from American International College, and has studied abroad at Spa Lingua, Belgium, and Oxford University. Her work has been recognized by the New England Press Association (NEPA) and the Public Relations Society of America (PRSA).
item.name: April Breakfast Meeting- Interacting in an Interactive Age
